title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 105.1 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 105.1 - Preamble

State Regulations

These electric utility emergency plans are primarily
intended to ensure adequate utility response for storm and storm-like
emergencies; however, some aspects of the plans will have application to
virtually all electric emergencies (e.g., customer contacts, communication with
the media and government officials) and should be used
accordingly. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
105.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
